pkgmetadata.longdescription: Maximum Likelihood Analysis of Circular Data // A series of wrapper functions to implement the 10 maximum likelihood models of animal orientation described by Schnute and Groot (1992) DOI:10.1016/S0003-3472(05)80068-5. The functions also include the ability to use different optimizer methods and calculate various model selection metrics (i.e., AIC, AICc, BIC).
